scripts.build:wasm: wa compile -D SEN_BUILD_WASM -o dist/sen-wasm.wasm src/c/wasm.c -i src/c/sen/bind.c -i src/c/sen/colour.c -i src/c/sen/colour_scheme.c -i src/c/sen/cursor.c -i src/c/sen/focal.c -i src/c/sen/genetic.c -i src/c/sen/lang.c -i src/c/sen/lib.c -i src/c/sen/mathutil.c -i src/c/sen/matrix.c -i src/c/sen/multistring.c -i src/c/sen/parametric.c -i src/c/sen/parser.c -i src/c/sen/path.c -i src/c/sen/printf.c -i src/c/sen/prng.c -i src/c/sen/render_packet.c -i src/c/sen/repeat.c -i src/c/sen/shapes.c -i src/c/sen/strtof.c -i src/c/sen/timing.c -i src/c/sen/unparser.c -i src/c/sen/uv_mapper.c -i src/c/sen/vm_compiler.c -i src/c/sen/vm_interpreter.c -I src/c
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:wasm
scripts.build:all:production: npm run clean && npm run build:production && npm run build:wasm
scripts.build:server:linode: cross-env GOARCH=amd64 GOOS=linux go build src/go/serve.go
scripts.publish:local: npm run build:all:production && npm run build:server:linode && mkdirp ../seni.app/public/_create && cp -r assets ../seni.app/public/_create/. && cp -r dist ../seni.app/public/_create/. && cp -r server ../seni.app/public/_create/. && cp serve ../seni.app/public/_create/.
